00084         public override string ToString()
00085         {
00086             try
00087             {
00088                 StringBuilder Builder = new StringBuilder();
00089                 Builder.Append("<MenuItem><Name>").Append(Name).Append("</Name><URL>").Append(URL).Append("</URL<TouchArea X1=\"")
00090                     .Append(X1).Append("\" Y1=\"").Append(Y1).Append("\" X2=\"").Append(X2).Append("\" Y2=\"").Append(Y2)
00091                     .Append("\" /></MenuItem>");
00092                 return Builder.ToString();
00093             }
00094             catch { throw; }
00095         }
